ignoreCommand: PREV="${VERCEL_GIT_PREVIOUS_SHA:-}"; CUR="${VERCEL_GIT_COMMIT_SHA:-HEAD}"; if [ -z "$PREV" ] || ! git cat-file -e "$PREV^{commit}" 2>/dev/null; then echo 'build: previous SHA missing; run build'; exit 1; fi; echo 'build: diff' $PREV '..' $CUR; git diff --quiet "$PREV" "$CUR" -- src public next.config.mjs package.json tsconfig.json eslint.config.mjs && { echo 'build: no relevant changes'; exit 0; } || { echo 'build: changes detected'; exit 1; }
